channel.title: Hugo 101 on Hello, my name is Todd Moore
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo 101 on Hello, my name is Todd Moore

item.title: Java Portfolio
item.description: Moore_Java_Portfolio A portfolio showcasing my Java skills, knowledge, and projects. Projects include scripting for games, object-oriented programming, and design. Some projects that I have worked on include Runescape automated player scripts and the back-end of a chat server using Java Sockets. Runescape Automated Player Scripts The Runescape automated player scripts helped with the understanding of: Java, Python, and C++ languages. Additional libraries used is Java Swing packages. More skills include API familiarity as I had to work with the games API as well as the automation client.

item.title: Data Science Portfolio
item.description: CS539 Final Project Description: The project to predict density of a tungsten based alloy using both regression type and classification based models as well as characterize trends and gather insight on fluence of features chosen had both insightful and shocking results. The challenge to predict ingot density, with a 70% cross-validated accuracy based on chemical properties, powder characteristics and basic processing parameters was seemingly successful using KNN, SVM, Random Forest and Decision Tree models.
